caption: Charming neighborhood restaurant with delicious Italian food, great service and ample wine list

First we have reservation at 9 at 9,25 still waiting for the table !! Barmans terrible they don’t have any idea how to prepare a cocktail mistake of the place to put so bad experience people on the bar !!! 9,35 we seated ! I asked a dover sole fish, very poor flavor , the check $$$$ what can I tell you I will never come back it’s a shame since we live close by my friends same opinion
Great service, good food!
Great food.  Covid responsible.  Friendly staff.

First let me say I wanted to work as a server here but was not hired But I was looking forward to eating here So I took my wife for dinner The greeting at the door was outstanding Now to the food the bruschetta tomatoes and Olives was very good I had Fettuccine Beef, Veal & Pork Bolognese, Reggiano Sorry to say it was tastless (shocking) My wife had the tuna Tatar she states was better at the Chessecake factory ( which they no longer serve) Now to my observation of the service 1- my wife's plate came dirty had to be replated 2- the food runner had to ask who food was who's ( called selling food at the table) should have seat positions so not to ask 3- I witnessed a server spinning a napkin in the dinning room ( what is that) Look am a old school server there are basic steps of service I expected better service I have Been a fine dinning waiter for 20 years Am writing this review from my observation only( not because I did not receive the position) The busser was right on point Am also am going to say the wait staff was very attentive My wife says it was very uneventful I was expecting a better experience The valet parking was outstanding The atmosphere great But this is my opinion only ( not sour grapes)

The restaurant is beautiful, street parking is an option, but I would recommend valet or park in the parking garage. Everything from the appetizers to the entree was presented very well. Dessert was a bit disappointing. I order the chocolate soufflé. I thought it would be like a traditional soufflé, but it was just a molten cake. I was disappointed. Overall excellent service, great food!

WoW... JS9.3 Almost a perfect night...  Follow me on Instagram @AbiteOUTwithJACK  The FOOD, service, space and overall experience was amaizng!  The Artichoke Salad special was a JS8.9  The Tuna Tatar was a JS8.5  The Ceasar with tomato, just great! JS8.5  The Homemade Fettuccine Punttansca, slightly too many olives, but the dish was a JS9.0  The Homemade Fettuccine Pomodor, Wow! JS8.8  The Bronzino was FRESH and filled with flavor! The portion was surprisingly spectacular too! JS9.4  DESSERT! Did NOT Disappoint!  The Fresh Festival of Fruit JS9.1  The SPIN on the Tiramiau was EPIC. JS9.4  My dirty SKATING cocktail was the biggest dossapointment of the night... Not dirty and was almost warm... JS0.0

This an excellent restaurant with friendly and accommodating staff. We came for lunch and the service as well as the food were outstanding. I highly recommend de carrot ginger soup and by far the best eggplant parmigiana in town. Edgar is definitely a star, a charming and a professional server.
Beautifull and elegant restaurant to celebrate special occasions or just to enjoy the real italian food. Excellent selection of wine and excellent attention too
The attention was good, however, I didn't like the food. I ordered the spaguetti, in my opinion it was too expensive and not that good. The cocktails were good though.
(Translated by Google) Excellent food, attention and hygiene measures. Very nice restaurant.  (Original) Excelente comida, atención y medidas de higiene. El restaurante muy bonito.
Excellent food and service
Amazing new addition to NMB / Aventura. Thrilled to have one nearby. Used to go to the one on federal in Fort Lauderdale but it’s a hike as I live in Miami Shores
Food was really good. I had Colorado lamb chops, cheesecake for dessert. Service is high standard.
Great food and service in a safe environment. I highly recommend.
(Translated by Google) Excellent service, very good menu, I found it a little expensive  (Original) Excelente atención muy buen menú me pareció un poquito caro

Highlights: gnocchi and chitarra  Very nice restaurant with good service and atmosphere. For appetizer we ordered the beef carpaccio and it was delicious. For mains, the gnocchi was the highlight, they are not shy with the lobster on it. The chitarra was also delicious and the plate is beautiful. The strozzapreti and tortelloni were not exactly what we were expecting, for the first the tomato seemed to overpower the taste of the lamb and for the second the taste was a little plain. Very positive experience nonetheless!
Amazing food and good service
Such amazing service and food!! Will be back!
Excellent service and delicious food. Staff was very attentive to our request to sit further away because of social distancing and accommodated us.
Food good. Atmosphere nice wine list great. But service is slow, very slow.
This was for my birthday. We stayed right next to this restaurant. Service and food was just excellent. Excellent!
Fantastic italian food. Fresh made pasta and a  variety of wines.  Recommend their delicate meatball and sausage, a great appetizer
Food was superb and service was top notch. First time at Aventura location...will visit again.
Great experience with tasty dishes and desserts, in addition to highly entertaining staff.
Superior Food and Service ad always
Great food and service!
One of the best  in the country
Nice ambience.Good food and service.

As a traveling fema nurse who has been serving Fort Lauderdale I stopped in here after completing a miserable long 12 hour shift. My waiter was absolutely disgustingly rude. After being ignored for 20 minutes I got up and went to the front booth to pay for my wine. I was charged 17$ for bottled water, & wine totaling 26$. Absolute robbery. As a nurse who assesses people very precisely, these Italian folks are indeed homophobes. You shall be ashamed of yourselves.  Please, do yourself a favor and skip the stop.  These people are extraordinary disgusting.
The main courses were so wonderful, the Cheesecake, espresso, and cortado were delicious, but the service was the sweetest experience. Thank you so much!
(Translated by Google) Very good attention, very nice place and good food, I recommend this place.  (Original) Muy buena atención, el lugar muy agradable y buena comida, recomiendo este lugar.

We where celebrating my little brother birthday he was turning 16 years old and we got a bottle of sparking wine and they actually gave him a cup full of sparking wine we where all shocked!. Funny but any ways the food just ok.

I was going to have dinner last night but after reading the revues no way. Also I am asking my self why the owner or the manager does not return emails or phone calls to customers it is the right thing to do and the customer deserves itI thing you have a “MANAGER” that is good for nothing and you are waisting money you should look for a better new “MANAGER”.

On Friday October 09/2020 we made a reservation for four people to have dinner. We arrive and we sit down and we look at the menu and I ask how much was a glass of wine and the waiter's favorite was tall $14 dollars and then we order food and I order a vchop which it was $44 dollars on the menu. The service was laussy and the waiter was very impolite.  But in the in  start to be friendly and I left him good tip. My wife order a pasta with sauce and she had intoxicated and she threw out. I pay the bill and was over charge. Next day a call the manager but he wasn't in so I left h a message with an employee and left my number to call me back and the manager never call me back. I think that's not the way to threat a customer. I am very disappointed because it is a four and a half star restaurant.
We love this place. Great service, wonderful ambiance and most important, delicious food!
This place is amazing. The ambient, the service and specially the food. We always go with friends and really enjoy. If you sit outside is beautiful. You always have a very enjoyable good time
Veal Parmesan
Best food, drinks, and service!

Best penne I've ever had. Even the salad appetizers are extraordinary. This is a great place for fine dining. Initially turned away because our group wasn't dressed nicely enough, which was presumptuous given looks can be deceiving.

I saw an ad on website saying that they are hiring people for all positions. I just called this place and who answered the phone was extremely rude and unpolite. If you are looking for a job, don't go to this place. If you are a costumer, don't go to this place! If they don't know how to treat well the workers, they don't know how to treat well any human. Disappointed!
First time here and it was very pleasant.  The food was fresh and nicely presented.  The service was friendly and the decor was very elegant.  I will return and recommend it.

way over priced for the food all around. Drinks were not that great for what you are paying, you would think their bartenders would know how to make a decent old fashion for $16 . Beautiful atmosphere I can say that, service was mediocre. The Presentation of the food is nice with out a doubt, but again way way over priced for what it is.
This place provides wonderful service as well as delightful menu. One of my favourite places in the city. The food and drinks served rapidly and the prices were fair. I recommend this place.

(Translated by Google) An Italian rest, very well decorated, elegant, with a good menu and rich dishes. Great service by the innkeepers.  (Original) Un rest italiano, muy bien decorado, elegante,con un buen menú y ricos platos. Gran servicio por parte de los mesoneros.
Spectacular!

Superb food and service!! Very flavorful dishes...I have dined at Casa D'Angelo in Fort Lauderdale  a couple of times...it's great that they open up in Aventura. It keeps the same level of excellence...One of my favorite restaurants when it comes to fine dining. Eduardo - the waiter -  delivers outstanding service besides being very knowledgeable of its menu!! I highly recommend it!!
Delicious
Outstanding
A welcomed surprise in the Aventura. Will definitely eat there again.
Excellent service, food & ambiance!
Fit for foodies 😊 lovely service
(Translated by Google) Service, location, atmosphere  (Original) Service, location, ambiance
(Translated by Google) Very good place to eat for a drink  (Original) Muy buen lugar para comer para tomar una copa
My favorite Italian in Miami.  Very upscale great atmosphere and service, everything on the menu is delish.

A dynamic Italian restaurant with service that is second to none.  The food was amazing.  Fresh ingredients, homemade pasta, great atmosphere.  This place has it all.  If you are a wine connoisseur, this is the place you need to be.  I highly recommend this fantastic restaurant!
Excellent  100 % recommend
Nice atmosphere. Bring shawl or sweater as it is alway cold! Good size portions. Food a bit salty. Pasta here is good. A bit overpriced. Service is decent.
Waiter was great .... veal chop was way over cooked no moisture left in it at all .... we love his other three locations in Lauderdale.....

Excellent!!! The food is amazing, the staff outstanding, ambience so perfect, highly recommended, worth every penny. There is a cork fee if you want to bring your own bottle of wine. We will be back.🥰
Great food, beautiful atmosphere, awesome staff!
New restaurant in Aventura, Best Italian food around. Place looks very fancy and clean.
Beautiful space.  good service.   good food.
The place is very nice it was good diner the ñoquis are very good the risotto nice not excellent, the veal chop very good and the dessert it was nice I’ll recommend the place

(Translated by Google) Great Italian restaurant. Location is good. The quality of food is on top. The staff is super. The atmosphere is gorgeous. I recommend to everyone.  (Original) Отличный итальянский ресторан. Расположение хорошее. Качество еды на высоте. Персонал супер. Обстановка шикарная. Всем рекомендую.
A+
EXCELLENT SERVICE AND DELICIOUS FOOD. PASTA PESCE SUPERB
Excellent Food & Service....Highly Recommend
The food selection and wine was delicious

I had a great experience dining at Casa De Angelo. Ive been dining  at the Fort Lauderdale location and now I"m able to have the same amazing experience closer to home. I would highly recommend this fine Italian dining experience!

From the welcoming team at the door to the attentiveness of the servers I loved my dining experience at D’Angelo. A place I will most definitely return to with friends and family. And the lamb was to die for.
great ambiance, excellent service and excellent food, I ate the Branzino, in lunch hours the price is affordable recommended 100%
Terble service and hostess atention

Pretentious, arrogant, disorganized, lousy service, uncomfortable seating, mediocre food, high prices, abusive prices, not worth it, many better options in Aventura, we will not return. Best advise, spend your money dining somewhere else.
Great service, food, drinks and atmosphere. Will always go back and recomend.
Its a Great Restaurant with Excellent Cuisine and Service in a Smart and Sophisticated Setting.
Dinner was great. Our server, Aaron was better!
Beautiful restaurant,food Ok attention terribly, need professional bar tenders and waiters like in Casa d Angelo in Boca Raton and Fort Lauderdale
Excellent fresh and flavorful food. Outstanding service. Beautiful Decor. But is expensive
(Translated by Google) Fine cuisine with Italian products  (Original) Cucina raffinata con prodotti Italiani

(Translated by Google) Beautiful location, tastefully furnished and with quality material, the food reflects the "Italian think", quality products such as the excellent tagliolini with white truffle and the excellent vermentino di Sardegna, white wine from the boss's personal cellar. Impeccable service. Unique note to improve the aspiration of the kitchen, let the aromas pass a little.  (Original) Bella location, arredata con gusto e con materiale di qualità, il cibo rispecchia l' "italian think", prodotti di qualità come gli ottimi tagliolini al tartufo bianco e l'ottimo vermentino di Sardegna, vino bianco della cantina personale del boss. Servizio impeccabile. Unica nota da migliorare l'aspirazione della cucina, lascia passare un po i profumi.

We had a reservation for 8:45 8 people we got there a little early and waited at the bar I ordered some appetizers that was just ok and we waited until 9:15 and our table was not ready I asked for my check and to my surprise the bartender charged me for someone else drink the place was a complete disaster and unorganized and to be honest it’s not a cheap place to eat it’s expensive and the food is just ok ,I’m not going to this place again,we ended up going to another restaurant and had a great dinner
Total disaster the place was unorganized we had 8:45 reservation and by 9:15 table is still not ready we ended up leaving to another restaurant I’ll never go there again a huge disappointment
Total disaster,  had 8:45 ,reservations,  could not accommodate,  total disarray , major growing pains, will never come back.
Great new add to the area. Nice change and good food and service.

We were visiting this new place in Aventura. 6:15 Saturday night. we were sited promptly at a table that "kissed" two other table with an extra benefit of my chair being hit a few times by a passing waiter, till our waiter asked me to move my chair closer to the table. the appetizers came within 5 minutes of ordering, together with the drinks. we have tried to postpone ordering the main course, but the waiter insisted of us placing the order, promising not to rush us out. never the less, the bill was put unceremoniously on our table at 7:15 without us asking. When we kept sitting, the manger came to ask if we need coffee or anything else. I'm aware it is a busy Saturday night, but this is  a relative expensive restaurant and neither us nor our friends  enjoyed being rushed out and for this matter the whole dinning experience. oh yes , the food. The salad which 3 of us tasted was sent back, the  veal chop Milanese was excellent, the rest just mediocre. and one last remark. My friend asked for a glass of Cabernet. The  waiter offered 2 options and recommended one without specifying the price or referring her to the wine list. If anyone think that a bill of 25.00 a glass is reasonable,please go for it!
Very nice place,  with high end service and food. I didn't check the wine list, but from the looks of their wine cellar it sure got what you like. Medium cost.

SO disappointed and SO expensive! The Ft.  Lauderdale location is so much better than this location. The best part of this place is that they take reservations and you don't have to wait. This place is not worth the trip.

Casa D’Angelo restorante Aventura Florida  Today I had lunch at this restaurant and was WOWED!!!! The food was especially delicious, the help so gracious, and the ambience was extraordinary!! I can’t wait to tell me friends of my experience there... If you are looking for a new and exciting place for lunch or dinner, I promise you will be amazed!!! I NEVER comment on Facebook page but I had to come home and text!!! Special thanks to Alfredo who made our afternoon memorable!! Rowena Franco .............

I am a frequent visitor at casa de Angelo in Fort Lauderdale. We live the food there. I was very excited that they opened in Aventura. I had a dinner with my family and friends from out of town.  The waiter was pitching us pasta with butter and white truffle and another meal with truffle but failed to mention it was almost $100.00 for each dish. Although it was a great dish, I was pretty disappointed when I received the bill. I did not say anything at the time  but decided to call today. Spoke to the manager and all he could say was that the policy is not to mention prices and that their price for truffle is below market. I believe at these price points you should give your customers the opportunity to decide if they want to pay $100.00 for a pasta dish like most other high end restaurants.
Overpriced. Very good service.  Below Average food .  Will try again to be fair since it recently opened. Very pretty decor and nice ambiance
Very upscale place with good food and a large wine menu. Poor and little vegetarian option, tough.

Went to Casa for the first time based off positive reviews and the restaurant exceeded my expectations! Alfredo the general manager personally came over to introduce himself and make sure we were satisfied with our food. I have gone to many brunches and felt the live music was a very nice touch. Service and food were top notch,  looking forward to my next visit!

This was one of the best dinner experiences ever!! This place is beautiful and comfortable, the staff is very friendly and professional, and the food and wine selection is great.  Every dish was delicious and perfectly cooked, and I had a veal chop with white truffle that was amazing!!  Thank you for a wonderful and fun dinner, can’t wait to go back!
Despite being opened less than a week I consider it the best Italian restaurant in South Florida. The seafood, pasta and veal were incredible.  Make a reservation- You won't be disapponted.
